Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents including disposal group and discontinued operations

Net Cash from Financing Activities: cash provided by used in financing activities discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in financing activities continuing operations
Other Financing Activities: proceeds from payments for other financing activities
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from repayments of short term debt
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Net Cash from Investing Activities: cash provided by used in investing activities discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in investing activities continuing operations
Other Investing Activities: equity method investment dividends or distributions
payments for proceeds from derivative instrument investing activities
payments for proceeds from other investing activities
proceeds from derivative instrument investing activities
proceeds from sale of equity method investments

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect
cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect continuing operations
cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect disposal group including discontinued operations

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accounts payable and accrued liabilities
increase decrease in contract with customer asset
increase decrease in contract with customer liability
increase decrease in other operating assets
Net Cash from Operating Activities: cash provided by used in operating activities discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in operating activities continuing operations
Net Income: income loss from continuing operations including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax
Other Non-Cash Items: equity method investment other than temporary impairment
equity method investment realized gain loss on disposal
gains losses on extinguishment of debt
income loss from equity method investments
Stock-Based Compensation: share based payment arrangement noncash expense continuing operations

__unmapped__: proceeds from divestiture of businesses and interests in affiliates
